formatDescription: ADX is a proprietary audio storage and compression format developed by CRI Middleware. PRONOM currently holds one PUID for all known version numbers, with separate identification signatures for each.
provenanceCompoundName: Artefactual Systems Inc / Artefactual Systems Inc

internalSignatures.name: ADX V3
internalSignatures.note: 2 Byte Magic, then variable 2 byte offset to copyright statement (max value 0xFFFF, or 65535 bytes). Bytes 0x12-13 are the version and encryption flag statements.

internalSignatures.name: ADX V4
internalSignatures.note: 2 Byte Magic, then variable 2 byte offset to copyright statement (max value 0xFFFF, or 65535 bytes). Bytes 0x12-13 are the version and encryption flag statements.
